title: Fastest Growing Industry
description: In 2022, Guyana's industry, including construction, experienced an impressive growth rate of 98.53%, one of the highest in the world.

title: Lowest CO2 Emissions from Waste
description: As of 2023, Guyana had one of the lowest carbon dioxide emissions from waste, with only 0.0001 Mt CO2e.

title: Most Population Living Below 5 Meters Elevation
description: In 2015, 78.48% of Guyana's population lived in areas where the elevation is below 5 meters, one of the highest percentages globally.

title: Minimal Hydroelectric Power Production
description: In 2021, only 0.0008% of Guyana's electricity was produced from hydroelectric sources, one of the lowest percentages worldwide.
